task.title: How to Pack
task.shortdesc: Packing will take virtually no time at all with this guide.

taskbody.context: Be sure to start packing at least 2 hours before leaving.

step.cmd: Get a suitcase that will be large enough for a week.
Pack all of the clothing that you will need, including swimwear.
Pack all of the electronics that you will want and their chargers.
Pack all of the homework that you will have to do, but won't.
